content.rendered:
On June 21,  the district held a retirement reception to celebrate staff members who retired during the 2021-2022 school year.

Congratulation to the following staff members:

  • Caroline Street: Cynthia Isaacson and Robert Pearsall
  • Division Street: Linda Fuller and Dorothy Keogh
  • Dorothy Nolan: Sue Norton, Sara Rodriguez, Hillary Tucker, and Judith Goralski
  • Lake Avenue: Dr. Barbara Messier
  • Maple Avenue Middle School: Robin Eichorst, Charles Ford, Debra Henry, Thomas Kohle Dorothy Nickels, and Robert Schretzlmeir, Maureen Hodges, Melissa Woods, and Lynn Zabala
  • Saratoga Springs High School: Donna Giacomaro, Donna Lewis, Thomas Olson, Susan Phillips, Patricia Rhodes, and Christopher Shanks
  • Facilities and Operations Department: Jeffrey Becktoff, Augustus Fleming, and Kathryn Roicki
  • MacFadden Administration Building: Laurette Loucks, Mary Nann, Wendy Stadnyk, Annetta Dunham, and Madeline Daley
  • Transportation Department: Diane Henderson, Daniel Scripter, Geraldine Sherman, Peter Wright, and Wanda LaFrance
